title: Unspecific Error Occured
body: SO far i have rebooted my computer (windows), re installed league, repaired league, run LeagueClient.exe as admin ran LeagueClient in normal user, any solutions?

replies.body:
Since you've already made sure to set up those admin rights again, this might be an issue with some of the game files themselves. Use the image below to delete a specific file, and make sure to run the other one mentioned and let the game patch normally. Let me know if this doesn't help though!

https://i.gyazo.com/525732c6e6490f22b283494bf794e027.png
